title: Mobile devices used by U.S. students 2015 , by type and frequency
labels: A few times a month or less
summary: This grouped bar chart has 4 categories for the x axis of Response representing Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more.
The highest category is found at Tablet with a mean value of 33.333333333333336.
The second highest category is found at Laptop notebook or Chromebook with a mean value of 33.333333333333336.
